name: Aarakocra
description:
The aarakocra are intelligent bird-men living atop high mountains, soaring on thermal winds.

**Combat**: Dive attacks grant a +4 bonus and double damage.

**Habitat/Society**: Live in small tribes.

**Ecology**: Prey on small game.

name: Aboleth
description:
The aboleth is a loathsome, intelligent creature from subterranean lakes.

**Combat**: Tentacles transform skin into slime.

**Habitat/Society**: Build underwater cities.

**Ecology**: Absorbs nutrients and memories from prey.

name: Alu-Fiend
description:
Alu-fiends are female tanar'ri of human-demon heritage.

**Combat**: Use spell-like abilities such as *charm person*.

**Habitat/Society**: Seductive and manipulative, alu-fiends often serve higher-ranking demons.

**Ecology**: Feed on strong emotions like lust and anger.

name: Amphisbaena
description:
The amphisbaena is a two-headed serpent, capable of striking with both heads simultaneously.

**Combat**: Bites inflict poison.

**Habitat/Society**: Dwells in warm climates.

**Ecology**: Hunts small animals and reptiles.

name: Ankheg
description:
Ankhegs are giant burrowing insects often found in farmlands and forests.

**Combat**: Crushes prey with mandibles and sprays acid.

**Habitat/Society**: Lives in deep tunnels.

**Ecology**: Tunnel byproducts enrich soil.

name: Ant, Giant
description:
Giant ants are larger, more aggressive versions of common ants.

**Combat**: Uses powerful mandibles.

**Habitat/Society**: Forms large underground colonies.

**Ecology**: Omnivorous scavengers.

name: Ape, Carnivorous
description:
Carnivorous apes are large, aggressive primates known for their ferocity.

**Combat**: Attack with powerful fists and bite.

**Habitat/Society**: Found in tropical forests.

**Ecology**: Hunt small to medium animals.

name: Ape, Gorilla
description:
Gorillas are peaceful but powerful primates that defend themselves fiercely if threatened.

**Combat**: Attack with fists.

**Habitat/Society**: Live in troops in warm forests.

**Ecology**: Herbivorous, feeding on plants and fruit.

name: Archon, Lantern
description:
Lantern archons are glowing spheres of light serving in the celestial armies.

**Combat**: Emit blasts of radiant energy.

**Habitat/Society**: Serve higher archons loyally.

**Ecology**: Need only positive energy to survive.

name: Ariel
description:
Ariels are gentle fey creatures often found near enchanted groves.

**Combat**: Use spell-like abilities to evade and confuse enemies.

**Habitat/Society**: Live solitary or in small groups.

**Ecology**: Sustain themselves on magical energies.

name: Arrowhawk
description:
Arrowhawks are flying elemental predators that hunt in the skies of the Plane of Air.

**Combat**: Discharge lightning and shock attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary hunters.

**Ecology**: Feed on creatures of air and energy.

name: Assassin Vine
description:
The assassin vine is a deadly, mobile plant that kills and consumes animals and humanoids.

**Combat**: Strikes and constricts prey.

**Habitat/Society**: Grows in dense forests.

**Ecology**: Derives nourishment from decomposing victims.

name: Aurumvorax
description:
The aurumvorax, or golden gorger, is a ferocious, heavily muscled beast that prizes gold.

**Combat**: Bites and clamps onto prey.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary and territorial.

**Ecology**: Diet consists of minerals and flesh.

name: Axe Beak
description:
Axe beaks are large, flightless birds known for their vicious tempers.

**Combat**: Attack with a heavy beak capable of breaking bones.

**Habitat/Society**: Found in plains and forests.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous, hunt small creatures.

name: Baboon
description:
Baboons are aggressive primates found in warm forests and plains.

**Combat**: Attack with bite.

**Habitat/Society**: Live in troops led by dominant males.

**Ecology**: Omnivores, scavenging and hunting.

name: Badger
description:
Badgers are small burrowing mammals with a ferocious temper.

**Combat**: Bite and claw in a frenzy when provoked.

**Habitat/Society**: Burrow in forests and fields.

**Ecology**: Feed on roots, insects, and small animals.

name: Baku
description:
Baku are peaceful creatures that feed on evil dreams and nightmares.

**Combat**: Can affect dreams and become ethereal.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary; wander the planes.

**Ecology**: Draw sustenance from negative emotions.

name: Barghest
description:
Barghests are fiendish shapechangers that prey upon mortals to grow in power.

**Combat**: Attack with claws and can drain life energy.

**Habitat/Society**: Infiltrate humanoid societies.

**Ecology**: Feed on the souls of intelligent beings.

name: Basilisk
description:
Basilisks are eight-legged reptiles whose gaze can turn creatures to stone.

**Combat**: Bite and petrifying gaze.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary and territorial.

**Ecology**: Feed on petrified prey and minerals.

name: Bat, Giant
description:
Giant bats are large, nocturnal mammals that hunt small prey.

**Combat**: Bite attack.

**Habitat/Society**: Roost in caves or trees.

**Ecology**: Insectivorous and carnivorous.

name: Beholder, Eye of the Deep
description:
The eye of the deep is a beholder-like creature adapted to aquatic life.

**Combat**: Claw, bite, and magical eye rays.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary hunters of deep waters.

**Ecology**: Prey on sea life and sailors.

name: Beholder, Gauth
description:
Gauth are aggressive, smaller kin of the beholder.

**Combat**: Eye rays and bite.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary or small groups.

**Ecology**: Feed on magic and living beings.

name: Beholder, Observer
description:
Observers are a more benevolent offshoot of the beholder species.

**Combat**: Use defensive and control eye powers.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary.

**Ecology**: Prefer observation to combat.

name: Beholder, Spectator
description:
Spectators are lesser beholderkin often tasked with guarding important treasures.

**Combat**: Eye rays focused on defense and deterrence.

**Habitat/Society**: Serve powerful beings.

**Ecology**: Need little sustenance.

name: Beholder, Tyrant
description:
Tyrants are monstrous beholders obsessed with conquest and control.

**Combat**: Devastating magical eye powers.

**Habitat/Society**: Dominate lesser creatures.

**Ecology**: Consume magic and life energy.

name: Beetle, Giant Bombardier (Variant)
description:
Variant bombardier beetles have stronger acid bursts and are slightly larger.

**Combat**: Bite and stronger acid spray.

**Habitat/Society**: Dense jungles.

**Ecology**: Insectivores.

name: Biloko
description:
Biloko are vicious forest spirits known for luring travelers to their deaths with illusions.

**Combat**: Bite attack and illusion magic.

**Habitat/Society**: Dense tropical forests.

**Ecology**: Feed on flesh and fear.

name: Bird, Giant Eagle
description:
Giant eagles are majestic predators allied with good creatures.

**Combat**: Claws and bite, powerful dive attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: High mountain aeries.

**Ecology**: Hunt large prey.

name: Bird, Giant Owl
description:
Giant owls are intelligent and often ally with good beings.

**Combat**: Claws, beak, and silent flight for ambush.

**Habitat/Society**: Forest nests.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous hunters.

name: Bird, Giant Roc
description:
Rocs are immense birds of prey capable of carrying off elephants.

**Combat**: Powerful swoops and devastating attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Mountainous regions.

**Ecology**: Apex aerial predators.

name: Blink Dog
description:
Blink dogs are intelligent canines that teleport short distances in combat.

**Combat**: Bite and blinking to avoid blows.

**Habitat/Society**: Live in packs.

**Ecology**: Hunt evil creatures.

name: Boar, Giant
description:
Giant boars are huge, aggressive wild pigs known for their toughness.

**Combat**: Gore attacks and ferocious charges.

**Habitat/Society**: Forests and plains.

**Ecology**: Omnivorous scavengers.

name: Boar, Wild
description:
Wild boars are aggressive and dangerous animals found in forests and plains.

**Combat**: Gore attack; fights even when badly wounded.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary or in small groups.

**Ecology**: Omnivorous.

name: Boggle
description:
Boggles are small, mischievous fey known for slipping through tiny cracks.

**Combat**: Bite and escape tricks.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary pranksters.

**Ecology**: Feed on magical energies.

name: Bone Devil (Osyluth)
description:
Bone devils enforce order in the Nine Hells, acting as cruel jailers and punishers.

**Combat**: Claws and a venomous tail sting.

**Habitat/Society**: Serve greater baatezu.

**Ecology**: Feed on suffering and fear.

name: Booka
description:
Bookas are friendly fey that assist good-hearted creatures with household tasks.

**Combat**: Avoid fighting; use spells if pressed.

**Habitat/Society**: Live unseen in homes.

**Ecology**: Need little food, prefer kindness.

name: Bralani
description:
Bralani are stormy eladrins who delight in the freedom of the winds.

**Combat**: Swordplay and wind magic.

**Habitat/Society**: Patrol the planes.

**Ecology**: Embodiments of freedom and chaos.

name: Brain Mole
description:
Brain moles are tiny psionic rodents that feed on mental energy.

**Combat**: Psionic blast to stun prey.

**Habitat/Society**: Underground warrens.

**Ecology**: Feed on psychic creatures.

name: Braxat
description:
Braxats are powerful psionic reptiles known for their devastating breath weapon and brutal combat tactics.

**Combat**: Breath acid cloud and powerful melee attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Desolate wastelands.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous predators.

name: Braxat (Desert Variant)
description:
Desert braxats are adapted to sand environments, breathing deadly sand clouds instead of acid.

**Combat**: Sand breath and brutal melee attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Harsh deserts.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous desert predators.

name: Brownie
description:
Brownies are small, good-hearted fey that help kind-hearted folk.

**Combat**: Avoid combat; use minor spells.

**Habitat/Society**: Found near human villages.

**Ecology**: Require minimal sustenance, thrive on goodwill.

name: Bulette
description:
Bulettes, or landsharks, are ferocious predators that burrow through the ground to ambush prey.

**Combat**: Devastating claw and bite attacks; leaping ambush.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary hunters.

**Ecology**: Feed on anything that moves.

name: Bullywug
description:
Bullywugs are amphibious humanoids that dwell in swamps and marshes.

**Combat**: Primitive weapons, ambush tactics.

**Habitat/Society**: Tribal groups.

**Ecology**: Opportunistic hunters and raiders.

name: Buoyancy Beast
description:
Buoyancy beasts are aquatic creatures that manipulate their buoyancy to control their movement and surprise prey.

**Combat**: Slam attacks, rising ambushes.

**Habitat/Society**: Deep ocean regions.

**Ecology**: Feed on fish and aquatic creatures.

name: Caterwaul
description:
Caterwauls are predatory, magical felines known for their paralyzing shriek.

**Combat**: Claw, bite, and sonic attack.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary forest hunters.

**Ecology**: Nocturnal ambush predators.

name: Catoblepas
description:
Catoblepases are grotesque creatures whose deadly gaze can instantly kill.

**Combat**: Death gaze or tail smash.

**Habitat/Society**: Swamps and desolate places.

**Ecology**: Feed on carrion and decaying vegetation.

name: Centaur
description:
Centaurs are half-human, half-horse beings known for their love of nature and skilled archery.

**Combat**: Hooves and weapons.

**Habitat/Society**: Forest communities.

**Ecology**: Hunters and gatherers.

name: Centipede, Giant
description:
Giant centipedes are harmless except for their mildly poisonous bites.

**Combat**: Bite attack; poison causes weakness.

**Habitat/Society**: Underground and dark places.

**Ecology**: Feed on decaying matter.

name: Cerebral Parasite
description:
Cerebral parasites feed on psionic energy, draining it from unwary creatures.

**Combat**: No direct attacks; drain mental energy.

**Habitat/Society**: Exist near psionic beings.

**Ecology**: Sustain themselves on mental power.

name: Chaggrin
description:
Chaggrin are earth elementals who attack with crushing fists and merge into rock.

**Combat**: Slam attacks and merge into earth.

**Habitat/Society**: Elemental Plane of Earth.

**Ecology**: Part of elemental balance.

name: Chalkydri
description:
Chalkydri are celestial dragonlike beings that breathe holy fire against evil.

**Combat**: Claws, bite, and holy fire breath.

**Habitat/Society**: Heavens and upper planes.

**Ecology**: Champions of cosmic balance.

name: Chimera
description:
Chimeras are fearsome monsters with the heads of a lion, goat, and dragon.

**Combat**: Multiple attacks and dragon breath.

**Habitat/Society**: Wild mountains.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous predators.

name: Choker
description:
Chokers are small, sinister ambush predators that strangle prey with tentacle-like arms.

**Combat**: Strangle grapple.

**Habitat/Society**: Underground lairs.

**Ecology**: Feed on humanoids and vermin.

name: Chuul
description:
Chuuls are crustacean-like horrors that paralyze and devour their victims.

**Combat**: Claws paralyze and crush.

**Habitat/Society**: Swamps and lakes.

**Ecology**: Feed on humanoids and fish.

name: Cloaker
description:
Cloakers are strange, manta-like monsters that shroud themselves in darkness and moaning terror.

**Combat**: Moan to cause fear, engulf prey.

**Habitat/Society**: Deep underground.

**Ecology**: Feed on flesh and fear.

name: Cooshee
description:
Cooshees are elven hounds known for their fierce loyalty and keen senses.

**Combat**: Charge and bite.

**Habitat/Society**: Guard elven homes.

**Ecology**: Loyal carnivores.

name: Crab, Giant
description:
Giant crabs are massive crustaceans that use their crushing claws to catch prey.

**Combat**: Powerful claw attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Coastal regions.

**Ecology**: Scavengers and hunters.

name: Crabman
description:
Crabmen are amphibious humanoids who live in coastal regions and avoid violence.

**Combat**: Claw attacks only when threatened.

**Habitat/Society**: Peaceful underwater settlements.

**Ecology**: Harvest sea plants and fish.

name: Dark Creeper
description:
Dark creepers are secretive beings cloaked in shadows, preferring theft and ambush to open battle.

**Combat**: Weapon attacks and darkness powers.

**Habitat/Society**: Hidden cities.

**Ecology**: Feed on stolen goods and fear.

name: Dark Stalker
description:
Dark stalkers are the leaders of dark creepers, cloaked in deeper shadow and greater power.

**Combat**: Darkness and deadly weapons.

**Habitat/Society**: Rule dark cities.

**Ecology**: Draw strength from shadows.

name: Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)
description:
Deep gnomes are secretive, magic-resistant dwellers of the Underdark, known for their cunning and stealth.

**Combat**: Weapons and illusion magic.

**Habitat/Society**: Hidden deep cities.

**Ecology**: Gem miners and traders.

name: Derro
description:
Derro are cruel, twisted subterranean dwarves with a hatred of surface dwellers.

**Combat**: Poisoned weapons and magic resistance.

**Habitat/Society**: Underdark enclaves.

**Ecology**: Raiding parties and slavers.

name: Devil, Ice (Gelugon)
description:
Ice devils are elite baatezu warriors from the cold layers of Hell, known for their cruelty and strategic mind.

**Combat**: Ice weapons, freezing aura, magic resistance.

**Habitat/Society**: Armies of Baator.

**Ecology**: Enforcers of infernal order.

name: Devil, Lemure
description:
Lemures are the lowest form of baatezu, shapeless masses of flesh writhing in agony.

**Combat**: Blunt attacks, regenerate damage.

**Habitat/Society**: Serve higher devils.

**Ecology**: Soul-slaves awaiting transformation.

name: Dinosaur, Hadrosaur
description:
Hadrosaurs are duck-billed herbivorous dinosaurs that live in herds and flee predators.

**Combat**: Kicks and stampedes.

**Habitat/Society**: Swamps and river valleys.

**Ecology**: Graze on vegetation.

name: Dinosaur, Iguanodon
description:
Iguanodons are peaceful, herbivorous dinosaurs with sharp thumb spikes for defense.

**Combat**: Claws and defensive spikes.

**Habitat/Society**: Open plains and forests.

**Ecology**: Graze on vegetation.

name: Dinosaur, Tyrannosaurus
description:
Tyrannosaurus rex is the apex predator of the prehistoric world, feared for its massive jaws and ferocity.

**Combat**: Bite attacks, can swallow prey whole.

**Habitat/Society**: Tropical forests.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous giant predator.

name: Dire Wolf
description:
Dire wolves are larger and more aggressive cousins of common wolves, often hunting in packs.

**Combat**: Bite and pack hunting tactics.

**Habitat/Society**: Cold forests and mountains.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous predators.

name: Djinni
description:
Djinn are noble elemental beings from the Plane of Air, known for their magical powers and generosity.

**Combat**: Physical attacks, whirlwinds, spell abilities.

**Habitat/Society**: Floating cities of Air.

**Ecology**: Rarely interact with mortals.

name: Dog, Wild
description:
Wild dogs are feral, aggressive canines often found hunting in packs.

**Combat**: Bite attack; hunt in packs.

**Habitat/Society**: Forests, plains.

**Ecology**: Scavengers and hunters.

name: Doppelganger
description:
Doppelgangers are shapechangers that assume the forms of other creatures to deceive and infiltrate.

**Combat**: Physical attack or deception.

**Habitat/Society**: Hidden among other races.

**Ecology**: Feed on chaos and fear.

name: Dragon, Black
description:
Black dragons are vile and cunning swamp-dwellers with a corrosive acid breath weapon.

**Combat**: Breath weapon, claw/bite, spells.

**Habitat/Society**: Swamps, fetid marshes.

**Ecology**: Apex swamp predators.

name: Dragon, Brass
description:
Brass dragons are talkative desert dwellers who delight in conversation and sunlight.

**Combat**: Breath weapon (sleep/repulsion), spells.

**Habitat/Society**: Deserts and dry steppes.

**Ecology**: Conversational predators.

name: Dragon, Bronze
description:
Bronze dragons are coastal guardians with a fondness for good deeds and stormy weather.

**Combat**: Lightning breath weapon and spells.

**Habitat/Society**: Coastal cliffs and islands.

**Ecology**: Protectors of the weak.

name: Dragon, Green
description:
Green dragons are deceitful and cruel forest dwellers that breathe clouds of poisonous gas.

**Combat**: Breath weapon, spells, ambush.

**Habitat/Society**: Ancient forests.

**Ecology**: Tyrants of the woodlands.

name: Dragon, Red
description:
Red dragons are the most covetous, greedy, and powerful of the evil dragons, breathing devastating fire.

**Combat**: Fire breath, spells, brute strength.

**Habitat/Society**: Volcanic mountains.

**Ecology**: Apex predators and tyrants.

name: Dragon Turtle
description:
Dragon turtles are immense, aquatic dragonlike creatures capable of blasting steam from their mouths.

**Combat**: Steam breath weapon and powerful melee.

**Habitat/Society**: Deep oceans.

**Ecology**: Predators of the sea.

name: Dryad
description:
Dryads are beautiful tree spirits that charm intruders to protect their groves.

**Combat**: Charm magic and hiding within trees.

**Habitat/Society**: Ancient forests.

**Ecology**: Guardians of woodland life.

name: Dwarf, Duergar
description:
Duergar are dark dwarves of the Underdark, skilled in stealth, psionics, and cruelty.

**Combat**: Weapons, invisibility, enlargement.

**Habitat/Society**: Subterranean strongholds.

**Ecology**: Slave-takers and craftsmen.

name: Eagle, Giant
description:
Giant eagles are noble, intelligent birds that form alliances with good beings.

**Combat**: Talon and beak attacks; deadly diving strikes.

**Habitat/Society**: Mountain peaks.

**Ecology**: Aerial hunters and protectors.

name: Efreeti
description:
Efreet are cruel genies from the Plane of Fire, masters of flame and deceit.

**Combat**: Flaming weapons, spell powers, regeneration.

**Habitat/Society**: City of Brass.

**Ecology**: Traders and tyrants of flame.

name: Bear, Black
description:
Black bears are omnivorous mammals that generally avoid humans unless provoked.

**Combat**: Use claws and bite, can hug on successful attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Live solitary in forests.

**Ecology**: Omnivores; eat berries, roots, and small animals.

name: Bear, Brown
description:
Brown bears are larger and more aggressive than black bears.

**Combat**: Powerful claw attacks and a bone-crushing hug.

**Habitat/Society**: Roam temperate forests and mountains.

**Ecology**: Hunt larger prey in addition to foraging.

name: Bear, Cave
description:
Cave bears are prehistoric relatives of modern bears, immensely strong and aggressive.

**Combat**: Massive claws, bite, and deadly hugs.

**Habitat/Society**: Found in cold mountainous areas.

**Ecology**: Top predators, hunting large prey.

name: Beetle, Giant Fire
description:
Giant fire beetles are large insects whose glowing glands are highly prized.

**Combat**: Bite.

**Habitat/Society**: Live underground.

**Ecology**: Omnivores; glow for several days after death.

name: Beetle, Giant Bombardier
description:
Giant bombardier beetles can spray a boiling chemical cloud at attackers.

**Combat**: Bite and acid spray.

**Habitat/Society**: Underground dwellers.

**Ecology**: Eat carrion and smaller insects.

name: Beetle, Giant Boring
description:
Giant boring beetles are massive insects that dig vast tunnel networks.

**Combat**: Bite, collapse tunnels.

**Habitat/Society**: Create underground lairs.

**Ecology**: Consume vegetation and minerals.

name: Beetle, Giant Hercules
description:
Giant hercules beetles are massive, aggressive insects capable of toppling enemies with their horns.

**Combat**: Gore with massive horns.

**Habitat/Society**: Found in deep forests.

**Ecology**: Feed on vegetation.

name: Beetle, Giant Stag
description:
Giant stag beetles use their massive antlers to grapple and crush enemies.

**Combat**: Grapple with horns.

**Habitat/Society**: Live in woodlands.

**Ecology**: Feed on decaying vegetation.

name: Beetle, Giant Water
description:
Giant water beetles are amphibious predators known for their aggressive attacks.

**Combat**: Bite prey.

**Habitat/Society**: Freshwater lakes and rivers.

**Ecology**: Feed on fish and aquatic creatures.

name: Behir
description:
Behirs are serpent-like creatures capable of breathing lightning or attacking with many claws.

**Combat**: Breath weapon or claw and bite attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary hunters.

**Ecology**: Apex predators, hate dragons.

name: Beholder
description:
Beholders are floating orbs of flesh with a central eye and many magical eye stalks.

**Combat**: Eye rays cause devastating magical effects.

**Habitat/Society**: Extremely xenophobic.

**Ecology**: Apex magical predators.

name: Beholder, Death Kiss
description:
Death kiss are beholder-kin that feed by draining the blood of victims.

**Combat**: Tentacles latch and drain blood.

**Habitat/Society**: Solitary.

**Ecology**: Feed exclusively on blood.
